prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, portrait of a (small-statured mystical warrior:1.2), (extremely pale translucent biological skin:1.2), red circular ritual face paint, single hair strand, stoic expression, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: highly detailed skin pores, (natural skin subsurface scattering:1.3), (subtle skin imperfections:1.2), source palette preservation, identical color matching, (matching fine silk fabric texture on hat:1.2), cinematic mystical lighting, film grain
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, (3d render:1.3), (cgi:1.3), (toy:1.4), (plastic:1.3), (doll:1.5), mannequin, clown, airbrushed, smooth skin, low quality, cracks, muscular, (large build:1.2)
